meanings.definition: A piece of paper or card that gives the holder a certain right, especially to enter a place, travel by public transport, or participate in an event.
meanings.sent1: I showed my tickets to the usher to enter the movie theater.
meanings.sent2: She bought tickets for the train ride to the city.
meanings.sent3: The tickets to the concert were so valuable, they were kept in a safe.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the ticket to his heart, granting her entry to his affections.
meanings.sent5: The golden tickets shimmered with promise, granting access to the magical world of the theme park.
